title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\RedactImageRequest
name: RedactImageRequest
description:
Request to search for potentially sensitive info in an image and redact it by covering it with a colored rectangle.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.RedactImageRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description:
Parent resource name. The format of this value varies depending on whether you have specified a processing location: + Projects scope, location specified:
projects/PROJECT_ID/locations/LOCATION_ID + Projects scope, no location specified (defaults to global):
projects/PROJECT_ID The following example parent string specifies a parent project with the identifier example-project, and specifies the europe-west3 location for processing data: parent=projects/example-project/locations/europe-west3

params.name: data.image_redaction_configs
params.description: The configuration for specifying what content to redact from images.

params.name: data.include_findings
params.description: Whether the response should include findings along with the redacted image.

params.name: data.byte_item
params.description: The content must be PNG, JPEG, SVG or BMP.
